reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The prolonged refugee situation along Thailand-Burma border area has resulted in overcrowded camps and lack of educational opportunities. Additionally resettlement program favoring the most educated refugees has resulted in shortage of capacities among ref ugee organisations to manage the camps. The long-term development objective is that the self-esteem and skills of Burmese refugees have improved so that they can actively participate in the development of their respective local societies. The immediate obj ective of this project is to increase the literacy level and capacities of refugees to improve their living conditions as well as to strengthen the organisational management of the refugee CBOs. Project has worked toward the objective by providing the lite racy and language skills for the refugees so that they have more knowledge and skills to take care of themselves and their families as well as get involved in the camp activities. Livelihood skills have improved the refugees knowledge of engaging in small- scale business. Also their household level fund use management is reported to be strengthened. Project is implemented in Myanmar refugee camps in Site 1 and Site 2.
